entry.value: select S.Id,(Name+' '+Surname) as Ad,X.Lesson,X.Score from student AS S Left Join (select LS.personId as personId,L.LessonName AS Lesson,AVG(score) as score from [dbo].[lesson] as L LEFT JOIN [dbo].[LessonScore] as LS ON L.Id=LS.lessonId Group By LS.personId,L.LessonName ) as X ON S.Id= X.personId order by S.Id
